title: Task 1: Describe visual characteristics of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to describe Laocoön.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to describe Laocoön.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to describe Laocoön.

title: Task 2: Explains how artistic decisions shape the form, style, materials, or content.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain how the visual characteristics contribute to a sense of drama.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain how the visual characteristics contribute to a sense of drama.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain how the visual characteristics contribute to a sense of drama.

title: Task 3: Accurately explains how a specific work of art demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific evidence to explain how Laocoön departs from earlier Greek sculptural traditions.
The response accurately uses ONE example of specific evidence to explain how Laocoön departs from earlier Greek sculptural traditions.
